t: Amazon.com: ArtResin Epoxy Resin – High-Gloss Clear Coat for Artwork - 32 oz (16 oz resin + 16 oz hardener) (946 ml) : Arts, Crafts & Sewing
s: This was my first time using any resin, and it couldn't have been easier. I bought this brand because of the reviews along with the fact that it's food safe. It's hard to tell in a picture how the resin looks but trust me, it looks good. I followed the very simple instructions and I am very pleased.
